Parameters: Rational: the new aspect ratio for the activity in picture-in-picture, must be between 2.39:1 and 1:2.39 (inclusive).
setAspectRatio(android.util.Rational).Description: Sets the aspect ratio. This aspect ratio is defined as the desired width / height, and does not change upon device rotation.

Parameters: List: the new actions to show in the picture-in-picture menu.
setActions(java.util.List<android.app.Re.Description: Sets the user actions. If there are more than @B_android#app#Activity#getMaxNumPictureInPictureActions_E@ actions, then the input list will be truncated to that number.

Parameters: Rect: window-coordinate bounds indicating the area of the activity that will still be visible following the transition into picture-in-picture (eg. the video view bounds in a video player)
setSourceRectHint(android.graphics.Rect).Description: Sets the source bounds hint. These bounds are only used when an activity first enters picture-in-picture, and describe the bounds in window coordinates of activity entering picture-in-picture that will be visible following the transition. For the best effect, these bounds should also match the aspect ratio in the arguments.

Returns: an immutable @B_android#app#PictureInPictureParams_E@ to be used when entering or updating the activity in picture-in-picture.
